026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.tool;
027
028import java.util.*;
029
030import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
031import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
032import javax.lang.model.util.Elements;
033import javax.tools.JavaFileManager;
034import javax.tools.JavaFileObject;
035import javax.tools.JavaFileObject.Kind;
036
037import com.sun.source.util.DocTrees;
038import com.sun.source.util.TreePath;
039import com.sun.tools.javac.api.JavacTrees;
040import com.sun.tools.javac.code.ClassFinder;
041import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Flags;
042import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Source;
043import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol;
044import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol.ClassSymbol;
045import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol.CompletionFailure;
046import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol.ModuleSymbol;
047import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symtab;
048import com.sun.tools.javac.comp.AttrContext;
049import com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Check;
050import com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Enter;
051import com.sun.tools.javac.comp.Env;
052import com.sun.tools.javac.file.JavacFileManager;
053import com.sun.tools.javac.model.JavacElements;
054import com.sun.tools.javac.model.JavacTypes;
055import com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree;
056import com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree.JCClassDecl;
057import com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree.JCCompilationUnit;
058import com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree.JCPackageDecl;
059import com.sun.tools.javac.util.Context;
060import com.sun.tools.javac.util.Convert;
061import com.sun.tools.javac.util.Name;
062import com.sun.tools.javac.util.Names;
063
064/**
065 * Holds the environment for a run of javadoc.
066 * Holds only the information needed throughout the
067 * run and not the compiler info that could be GC'ed
068 * or ported.
069 */
070public class ToolEnvironment {
071    protected static final Context.Key<ToolEnvironment> ToolEnvKey
072        = new Context.Key<>();
073
074    public static ToolEnvironment instance(Context context) {
075        ToolEnvironment instance = context.get(ToolEnvKey);
076        if (instance == null)
077            instance = new ToolEnvironment(context);
078        return instance;
079    }
080
081    final JavadocLog log;
082
083    /** Predefined symbols known to the compiler. */
084    public final Symtab syms;
085
086    /** JavaDoc's subtype of the compiler's class finder */
087    private final ClassFinder finder;
088
089    /** Javadoc's subtype of the compiler's enter phase. */
090    final Enter enter;
091
092    /** The name table. */
093    private Names names;
094
095    /** If true, prevent printing of any notifications. */
096    boolean quiet = false;
097
098    /** If true, ignore all errors encountered during Enter. */
099    boolean ignoreSourceErrors = false;
100
101    Check chk;
102    com.sun.tools.javac.code.Types types;
103    JavaFileManager fileManager;
104    public final Context context;
105
106    WeakHashMap<JCTree, TreePath> treePaths = new WeakHashMap<>();
107
108    /** Allow documenting from class files? */
109    boolean docClasses = false;
110
111    /**
112     * The source language version.
113     */
114    public final Source source;
115
116    public final Elements elements;
117
118    public final JavacTypes typeutils;
119
120    protected DocEnvImpl docEnv;
121
122    public final DocTrees docTrees;
123
124    public final Map<Element, TreePath> elementToTreePath;
125
126    /**
127     * Constructor
128     *
129     * @param context      Context for this javadoc instance.
130     */
131    protected ToolEnvironment(Context context) {
132        context.put(ToolEnvKey, this);
133        this.context = context;
134
135        log = JavadocLog.instance0(context);
136        syms = Symtab.instance(context);
137        finder = JavadocClassFinder.instance(context);
138        enter = JavadocEnter.instance(context);
139        names = Names.instance(context);
140        chk = Check.instance(context);
141        types = com.sun.tools.javac.code.Types.instance(context);
142        fileManager = context.get(JavaFileManager.class);
143        if (fileManager instanceof JavacFileManager jfm) {
144            jfm.setSymbolFileEnabled(false);
145        }
146        docTrees = JavacTrees.instance(context);
147        source = Source.instance(context);
148        elements = JavacElements.instance(context);
149        typeutils = JavacTypes.instance(context);
150        elementToTreePath = new HashMap<>();
151    }
152
153    public void initialize(ToolOptions options) {
154        this.quiet = options.quiet();
155        this.ignoreSourceErrors = options.ignoreSourceErrors();
156    }
157
158    /**
159     * Load a class by qualified name.
160     */
161    public TypeElement loadClass(String name) {
162        try {
163            Name nameImpl = names.fromString(name);
164            ModuleSymbol mod = syms.inferModule(Convert.packagePart(nameImpl));
165            ClassSymbol c = finder.loadClass(mod != null ? mod : syms.errModule,
166                nameImpl);
167            return c;
168        } catch (CompletionFailure ex) {
169            chk.completionError(null, ex);
170            return null;
171        }
172    }
173
174    boolean isSynthetic(Symbol sym) {
175        return (sym.flags() & Flags.SYNTHETIC) != 0;
176    }
177
178    boolean isUnnamed(Symbol sym) {
179        return (sym.flags() & Flags.UNNAMED_CLASS) != 0;
180    }
181
182    void setElementToTreePath(Element e, TreePath tree) {
183        if (e == null || tree == null)
184            return;
185        elementToTreePath.put(e, tree);
186    }
187
188    public Kind getFileKind(TypeElement te) {
189        JavaFileObject jfo = ((ClassSymbol) te).outermostClass().classfile;
190        return jfo == null ? Kind.SOURCE : jfo.getKind();
191    }
192
193    /**
194     * Prints a notice unless {@code -quiet} was specified.
195     *
196     * @param key selects message from resource
197     */
198    public void printInfo(String key, Object... args) {
199        if (!quiet) {
200            log.printNoteUsingKey(key, args);
201        }
202    }
203
204    TreePath getTreePath(JCCompilationUnit tree) {
205        TreePath p = treePaths.get(tree);
206        if (p == null)
207            treePaths.put(tree, p = new TreePath(tree));
208        return p;
209    }
210
211    TreePath getTreePath(JCCompilationUnit toplevel, JCPackageDecl tree) {
212        TreePath p = treePaths.get(tree);
213        if (p == null)
214            treePaths.put(tree, p = new TreePath(getTreePath(toplevel), tree));
215        return p;
216    }
217
218    TreePath getTreePath(JCCompilationUnit toplevel, JCClassDecl tree) {
219        TreePath p = treePaths.get(tree);
220        if (p == null)
221            treePaths.put(tree, p = new TreePath(getTreePath(toplevel), tree));
222        return p;
223    }
224
225    TreePath getTreePath(JCCompilationUnit toplevel, JCClassDecl cdecl,
226            JCTree tree) {
227        return new TreePath(getTreePath(toplevel, cdecl), tree);
228    }
229
230    public com.sun.tools.javac.code.Types getTypes() {
231        return types;
232    }
233
234    public Env<AttrContext> getEnv(ClassSymbol tsym) {
235        return enter.getEnv(tsym);
236    }
237}
